participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing with a passion for cooking and swimming.
participant_1.background: I am allergic to seafood. I own an iPhone 7. My father worked 11 hours a day. I drink hot chocolate during the winter. My mother used to read me bedtime stories.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and adventurous, with a love for animals and trying new things in the kitchen.
participant_2.background: I enjoy swimming. I do not like green eggs and ham. I have a missing pinky toe. I have 4 dogs. I love cooking.

content.text: Hi there! What do you do for fun?
I love swimming! It's so relaxing and I always feel better afterwards.
I love swimming too! It's a great way to stay in shape.
I agree! Do you have a pool?
No, I live in an apartment building. I have to go to the pool at the rec center.
I used to have to do that too. It was always a pain to get there and back.
Yeah, it can be a hassle. But it's worth it for the exercise!
I agree! What's your favorite stroke?
I like to do freestyle. It's the most efficient way to swim.
That's what I like too! It's also the most relaxing.
Yeah, it is. I like to just zone out when I'm swimming freestyle.
Me too! It's a great way to clear your head.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to cook! I'm always trying new recipes.
That's awesome! I love to cook too.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta. It's so easy to make and it's always delicious.
I love pasta too! It's one of my favorite foods.
What's your favorite kind of pasta?
I like penne. It's the perfect shape for holding sauce.
I agree! Penne is my favorite too.
It's so good! We should cook pasta together sometime.
That would be fun! I love cooking with friends.
